item.description:
Hello Everyone,

Our next meditation meet up will be held at the Center of Light in JP on Friday Sept. 29th at 7pm.

Learn and practice techniques to quiet the Mind and tune into a more peaceful place. The mind is really quite unruly and if you can get a hold of it , it won't bother you as much as it does right now.

You can check out some more details under the group description.

I am really looking forward to meeting everyone.

See you there.

In Light,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Meditation and Mystical tea
